channel.title: How do i make a client for lets say galkons base please help!
channel.description: ok iam new to making clients iam a good coder and will probly understand anything that i need to do to make my own client for my server but i just need someone to point me in the right way hmm like telling me how to download a base client to began with please help someone! :) my msn is (( pyro7117@hotmail.com )) ~coder pyro

item.title: How do i make a client for lets say galkons base please help!
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

download Galkons Client base here.
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,292487.0.html

to edit the the default ip to yours, go into EGUI.java and you should see something like this

"","",""

add your server ip into those EXAMPLE:

"IDKscape","no-ip","info"

If you have Nulls on your server, just open class8.java, and edit the null item’s id to the silab items.

The main Editing Files, are the Client.java, and Gui.java.

You can change the client background somewhere in the cache

anymore questions just ask

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a client for lets say galkons base please help!
